评论详情: The off the shoulder type always rolls back on. I hate that. But the fit was good. The thickness was suitable for winter, Warmth was great. Everything else was great.

It feels soft, size is perfect, material is so thick but not hot the shoulders just didn’t come down on me for some reason it was like a turtle neck i wanna keep it but it looks weird. but i know my husband would love this material and my ass looked great in it. so sad to send it back 🥲

I read a lot of the comments before buying so I was a bit hesitant but I’m glad I did! It’s super comfortable. Really soft fuzzy material. The downside to the material is that it’s that super static material. Holy Moly I was shocking myself putting it on hahah. But it fits well! I’m in the process of losing weight and currently 233lbs and 5’7”. Not exactly sure my size but I’ve been between L and XL, so I bought the XL just to make sure it would be flattering and not tight.  It looked smallish when I pulled it out of the package but it’s sooo soft and stretchy it fit great and very flattering. The neck is turtle neck and looks great just like that, you can also pull it down to go over the shoulders but the original form is essentially a turtle neck so it doesn’t stay down if you are moving around. But that’s fine because it looks great both ways. It’s thick enough to be warm and not see through but lightweight enough to not make you sweat. Excited to wear this as a winter dress. A few people commented on it being ok the shorter side, and yes I agree it is, but that’s exactly what I wanted. It’s hard to find dresses in my size that aren’t made granny length. This flatters you and still covers the goods. Wearing it indoors with heels, but pairing with fleece tights to wear outdoors! I recommend!
Love how soft this is but because it’s so soft it moves up and off your shoulders very very easily. Still love it!

The dress was beautiful and warm in the cold... However, I had to use safety pins to keep the shoulders down which still didn't work great. I was constantly pulling them down. But I received many compliments.
I love this dress, it's super soft and warm. My only gripe is getting it to actually stay OFF the shoulders. I even pinned with 5 safety pink and it still slips up so that's annoying lol.
I had to fight the “off the shoulder” aspect because it kept rising up and un”flapping” itself. does not stay down. Very soft but a struggle all night.

评论概述: The fabric will not allow the top to stay folded on top.
评论详情: Ok_ the material A+ The stretchyness A+ The concept A+  However- major design fail!!! I can’t believe for this price they down sew the top of the dress down so that it stays in place off your shoulders. Instead, the stretchy fabric just flys u the second you line your arms at all. Clearly no one wants to wear something out that they would have to keep their arms glued to their sides ( impossible ) or you will constantly have to keep pulling at your Shirt to fit right. ( annoying)  So —- because I liked the look and fabric of The dresses, I opted to keep them and sew the stops down into place by lining up the seams and stitching them in a bunch of places.. I don’t know how long or how many washes that will hold but at least I got it to stay put ..  I shouldn’t have had to do That tho…

I combined this with belt and some knee high boots and I was ready to take over the world! True to size but can easily flatter a variety of body types. Thick but not too think stretchy material and soft so it doesn’t aggregate the skin

The material of this dress is so freakin' soft! It is extremely comfortable. I sized up because I knew it was going to be short. It fits well, I'm pretty curvy and when I actually let the dress sit on my curves it's extremely short (I have it pulled down in the picture and that makes me look really boxy). So, when I wore it out, I wore leggings and boots so it could ride up and hug my curves properly and that got rid of that boxy look but obviously made it shorter and it barely covered my bum. It's a flattering dress and the off the shoulder bit looks really cute. If you have a smaller build, I think it would accentuate where you want it to, and the fabric is thick enough it helps hide the small flaws. I have a large scar on my upper stomach, and I can often see it through fabric but not with this dress.

This bodycon sweater dress is really cute. I do feel that it runs about a size too small so if you were a medium, I would buy a large etc. After I washed and dried this dress, there were so many fuzzies that I wouldn’t wear it again. It also seems like it shrunk, which is why I say by one size larger than normal. Just wasn’t overall real happy with it.
This is the perfect dress when you want to be warm but also want to look sexy for a night out. Light material but very well made. My husband really loves when I wear this dress.

This is a gorgeous sweater dress!!! I ordered XL. I'm 5'7, aprox 200lbs. It fits beautifully, with a nice stretch, but also snug. It can be worn as a dress, or with leggings, or any pants really. The sleeves are nice and long and don't need to be pulled to lay nicely over your wrist and onto your hands. The neck can be folded over to go off shoulder or left unfolded for a cowl neck look. All.around, a perfect sweater/dress to pair with leggings and boots, or fishnets and stilettos(like I'm going to for my 40th birthday outfit) or some wide leg jeans and kitten heels.  It's also INCREDIBLY soft. I'm really happy with my purchase!!!!!!!! Definitely recommend!!!!

The dress is a perfect fit and it feels so soft to the touch and against the body. Long enough to wear to work and perfect for holiday gatherings. It is very stretchy and flattering. I love the dark brown color and it washes well. One of my favorite dresses for the winter.

评论概述: Size is a big off but...
评论详情: First and foremost, I loved how incredibly soft the fabric was. It felt amazing against my skin, and the dress was very comfortable to wear. The design is versatile and chic, making it a great choice for a party or club event.  However, I did encounter two issues one it has an odor and secondly problem with sizing. I ordered a medium, but the dress fit more like a large. It ran a bit bigger than expected, which was a tad disappointing. I recommend considering sizing down when purchasing this dress to ensure a better fit.  Despite the sizing hiccup, I received compliments and felt confident in this off-shoulder sweater dress. It's a stylish addition to my winter wardrobe, and I look forward to wearing it again, perhaps in a smaller size!

评论概述: Cute but ripped after trying it on once
评论详情: Tried the dress on one time and noticed a rip .

This dress is one of the most comfortable pieces I own! The material is so incredibly soft and very flattering.  I was worried that the fuzzy texture would make me look wide, but it doesn't at all. It hides all lumps and bumps well. This dress has a nice stretch that hugs and accentuates my curves. It is made very well, with even stitches, hems and not a single loose thread. It is also machine washable. I ordered my usual size, small, and it fits great. I'll also note that the off the shoulder design stays put, and doesn't shift every time I move my arms.  This dress is perfect for the colder months and holidays. An excellent value that I highly recommend!
So soft and cute. Not my normal color but I love it. The fold over collar is a bit funky but worth it. Feels like it'll be a great fall dress.

评论概述: Super soft sweater dress but color and sizing is off..
评论详情: The sweater dress is so soft and looks good on. It is really stretchy. I am normally a small but ordered this in a medium due to my bust measurement. It runs big and fits a little loose but still hugs your body. I should have went with my normal size. The color is also more of a darker red brown vs the picture which comes off as more of an ash lighter brown. Great for fall! Can’t wait to wear it.
Very cute and it’s soft! Fits great, i sized up just in case and it fit so cozy!
